As an immigration consultant at Deloitte, I provided guidance on immigration processes, assisted clients, and ensured compliance with immigration regulations. Through this role, I gained expertise in project management and client service skills.
As a freelance front-end developer, I created engaging and responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript and React, while collaborating with clients to understand their design requirements and ensure timely delivery of projects.
